Àtụ:Infobox dam
Spioenkop Dam na-ejide Osimiri Tugela na KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ dị n'ime ebe nchekwa okike nke otu aha ahụ

E nyere mmiri ahụ ọrụ na afọ 1972, nwere ikike nke ọnụ Ọgụgụ nkea ;272,265 bic mita (9,614,900 cu ft), na mpaghara elu nke ọnụ Ọgụgụ ndịa ;15.314 uare kilomita (5.913 sq mi), mgbidi mmiri ahụ dị mita iri ise na atọ (174 ) n'ịdị elu
Spion Kop (ugwu) dị kilomita abụọ pom ise n'ebe ugwu nke mmiri ahụ.
